title: Untitled
provenance_text:
Sam Francis [1923-1994]; Unidentified owner, perhaps Jean Planque [1]. James L. Winokur [1922-2009], Pittsburgh, PA, by 1977; partial gifts to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute (subsequently Carnegie Museum of Art,) Pittsburgh, PA, 1977 to 1986 [2].

Notes:
[1]. Per inscription on reverse "Pour M. [Planque?]/Amiti√©s/Sam Francis/1959. Swiss artist/collector/dealer adviser Jean Planque, who was living in Paris at the time, had met Sam Francis by 1959.
[2]. The watercolor was accessioned as a 1977 year-end partial gift on February 9, 1978. It was received at the museum on January 14, 1987. Committee action on completion of the gift as a 1986 year-end gift was taken on February 5, 1987.

creator.birth_place: San Mateo (San Mateo county, California, United States)
creator.death_place: Santa Monica (Los Angeles county, California, United States)
